105b9(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros myi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
106a1(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ gzungs 'di 'don
106a2(mdo): par bya'o// // na mo rad na tra yA ya/ tad d+ya tha ku Ti ku Ta ni/ mi mi ri to/ kro sha Ni/ mi mi ri Ne/ i ri'i sA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar gnas pa
106a3(mdo): la bka' stsal pa/ gzungs 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las zhig gis/ gzungs 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs
106a4(mdo): tshad myed dpag tu myed pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro// grangs myed pa 'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bsngags par byas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas de
106a5(mdo): rnams kyis kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang/ chub de la lung ston par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas pa gang zhi/ ka gzungs bsngags 'di 'chang ba des kos dang / bsod snyoms
106a6(mdo): dang / rin po che dang / mang du zos shing mkhas pa dang / nad mye da cing tshe ring ba las stsogs pa/ yid bzhin du 'thob ste/ bsod nams shi nad tu mang du 'phel lo// ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang /
106a7(mdo): de thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas pa bsngags pa 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub ma thob kyi bar du/ rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gser ki krong
106a8(mdo): byer ri bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /
106a9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' pir ka la chen po las stsogs pa dang / lhan gcig tu gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis bsrung bar byed do// bde bar gnas gzungs 'di bsgrub po'i cho ga ni 'di yin
106b1(mdo): bar shes par bya'o// thog mar bzlas brjod khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas pas bsnyen par bya'o// de nas phang pa dben pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor byas te/ tshes bcu drug gi nyid par 'khrus byas/ kos sar pa gyon te/
106b2(mdo): gdug pa dang / me tog dang / zhal zas sna mang po las stsogs pas/ mchod pa bya zhing / dkyil 'khor gi nang du zhugs nas/ thog mar sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan
106b3(mdo): nas brjod de/ gus pas phyag 'tshal zhing sdig bshags nas/ pus mo g.yas pa sa la btsugs te/ sngags de stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar zla'o// de nas lus bsrang te 'dug nas/ ci 'dod pa de bsam par bya'o// de
106b4(mdo): nas nyi ma ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha bas gtsang ma ba cig pa'o// de nas zhag bco lnga lon pa dang / bzod dkyil 'kho med nas byung bar bya ste/ myi de ni bsod nams dang / gzi brjid
106b5(mdo): kyi mthu sems bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / ldan zhing bsam/ ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kal te bsam pa ma grub na yang dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzos
106b6(mdo): par 'gyur bas/ de phyin tsat+ya rtag par rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ ka ser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/ le'u brgyad pa'o//
106b7(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzungs de gsungs nas// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang myi las stsogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la phan
106b8(mdo): pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid de bstand pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// bsam gyis myi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rab tu rgyas
106b9(mdo): bshad de// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par byas// sems cad blo chung rnam par myi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par myi nus te/ de lta bas na
107a1(mdo): mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdotsam rab tu bshad// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems can 'byung bya phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan
107a2(mdo): rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do// lus 'di 'gro khyim stong pa ji bzhin du// dbang po rnams ni dpag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad grong gcig nas mod kyi// de dag pa na
107a3(mdo): tshun rnam par myi shes so// myag gi dbang po gzugs 'gyur rnams la rgyug// rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod// sna'i dbang po sna tshogs dr-i rnams phrog// lce'i dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug/ lus kyi
107a4(mdo): kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par dpyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang da rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu ma lta bu g.yo
107a5(mdo): ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la rnam dpyod de// ji ltar myi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas
107a6(mdo): zhing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang // de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de
107a7(mdo): bzhin spyod yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yol bar gyur // dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed/ lus
107a8(mdo): ni g.yo ba myed cing byed pa byed// / snying po myed cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtogs pas byung // 'gro stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang mye dang chu dang drung
107a9(mdo): rnams dang // grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnas cig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnam bzhi po de dag kyang / gnyis
107b1(mdo): ni steng 'gro gnyis ni mthur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// sa'i sbrul dang chu'i sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad pa
107b2(mdo): 'gyur ba yin// me'i sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang myi dang
107b3(mdo): nang song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// bad kan rlung dang khris pa bang gyur da na// lus shi gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyi gang // mngon par myi dga' srim bu'i phung por gyur // dur khrod dag na
107b4(mdo): 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur // lha mo khyod ni rmo de rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can gang zag gang zhig yod// chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag
107b5(mdo): che 'byung myin// ma byung ba las byung zhing myi 'byung ste// gang ni phyir ni 'byung ba myi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// / yod pa myin zhing nam yang yod myin la// ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung
107b6(mdo): ba yin// ma rig pa 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes mying gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang
107b7(mdo): de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis myi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag// ma byung ba las byung dang myi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin
107b8(mdo): ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang // bdag gi lta bar gyur pa bcad par gos// ye shes ral gyis nyon mongs rgya mo drol// phung po'i gnas la stong par gyurd par ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis/
107b9(mdo): ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi zhu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstand// nga ni bdud rtsi grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ pa ni bdud rtsi zhu bas bdag tshim bya// ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs/
108a1(mdo): ngas ni chos kyi du gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa 'phab// ngas ni nyon mongs dgra tshogs rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi
108a2(mdo): rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng // srid pa'i tshe las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni nges song gsum gi lam rnams bkag// sems can nyon mongs mye yis gdungs gyur da pa// rten myed gyur de cing dpung nyen myed pa
108a3(mdo): dag/ srog chags nyon mongs myes gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi khu bas bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon bcas nas// 'dren pa bsam gyis myi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi
108a4(mdo): sku de yongs su tshol ba na// rtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni myig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// bye du r+ya
108a5(mdo): dang rin cen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams ca// da dang // rtswa dang rtsa rnams thams cad dang // nags 'tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrung ba thams cad bcad brngubs te// de
108a6(mdo): dag thams cad phyer blags nas// rab tu 'phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// rnam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ci tsam par// phye ma'i phung po spung sa nas ni// 'di la cha gsum byed par nus// sa la rdul ni yod
108a7(mdo): pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis myi khyab pa sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni sems can gcig gir gyur // shes pa de yise rdul rnams kyi// bye ma bgrang bar byed
108a8(mdo): na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan myi rnams kyis thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mya nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad gcig gcig la
108a9(mdo): 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba tu mar ni// gang du yang bgrang bar myi nus so// / gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o//
108b1(mdo): de nas lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro chos bstand pa/ shin tu bzang mo de thos nas/ dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes te// 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig
108b2(mdo): du gzar// pus mo g.yas pa'i lba nga sa la btsugs te// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud pas// bstan pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnal 'byor tu bya ba zhu ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das la
108b3(mdo): tshogs su bcad de gsol pa// rgyal ba rkang gnyis gtso lags te// 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa// byang chub spyod pa yang dag tshul// bdag la thugs rjes bshad du gsol// rigs kyi bu lnga la bka' stsal
108b4(mdo): pa// khyod la the tsom ci yod pa// dri ba'i don de zhus shika dang // rnam par phye ste bstand par bya// de nas yang rigs kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// bdag dang gzhan la phan gdas
108b5(mdo): phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das bral ba'o// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar myang // de nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka'
108b6(mdo): stsal to// lha mo chos kyi dbyings la gnas te// byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pas ni// mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // rigs kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la
108b7(mdo): 'di ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la gnas te// byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bgyi lags// lha mo de ni phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su gtog
108b8(mdo): te// chos kyi dbyings ni phung po lnga nyid do// phung po lnga yang brjod du myed pa// phung po lnga ma yin pa yang brjod du myed pa ste/ de la chos kyi dbyings de nyid phung po lnga yin na ni chad par 'gyur ro// kal te phu
108b9(mdo): po lnga las gzhan par 'dod na ni rtag par 'gyur de// mtshan ma gnyis dang bral ba// mtha' gnyis la myi gnas pa/ bltar myed pa/ blta bar bya ba las 'das pa/ mying dang mtshan ma myed pa de ni chos kyi dbyings
109a1(mdo): shes brjod do// rigs kyi lha mo phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ji ltar ga dgas zhe na// phung po lnga de ni rgyu dang / rkyen kyis ma bskyed pa ste// de yang gal te rgyu dang kye nang la skye ba zhig yin na mi skyes zir
109a2(mdo): ba skye 'am/ myi skye ba skye zhes bya// gal te skyes zin pa skye na ni// rgyu dang rkyend kyang myi dgos par rigs so// gal te ma skyes pa skye na ni/ skye ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ma skyes
109a3(mdo): pa'i chos rnams ni/ yod pa ma yin pa nyid pas mying myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ gzhal ba dang / dpag pa dang / dper bya bas mying brjod pa ste// rgyu dang rkyend kyis bskyed par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi lha mo
109a4(mdo): dper na rnga'i sgra ni/ shing dang ko ba dang / lag pa la brten te// s+tha 'byung mod kyi/ dza'i sgra de ni 'das pa yang stong / ma 'ongs pa yang stong nga / da ltar gnas pa yang stong ste// rnga'i sgra de ni shing las ma byung /
109a5(mdo): ko ba dang lag pa lnga kyang ma byung // dus gsum gyis ma skyed pas myi skye ba ste// gang myi skye ba de ni myi 'gog pa'o// gang myi 'gog pa de ni keng nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'o// gang nas kyang ma 'ongs
109a6(mdo): pa de ni gang du yang myi 'gro'o// gang du yang myi 'gro ba de ni rtag pa dang chad pa ma yin pas/ gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te gcig pa yin na/ chos kyi dbyings
109a7(mdo): dang tha myi dad pas// 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kyang / don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur da pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de lta ma yin pas de gcig pa ma
109a8(mdo): yin no// gal te tha dad pa yin na ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang / mtshan ma de nyid 'dzind pa yin pas/ rnam par grol bar yang myi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching
109a9(mdo): ba dang ma bral nas/ de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang myi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa rnams ni 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa yang dag pa'i ngo bor gcig pa'i phyir tha dad/
109b1(mdo): pa ma yin no// de bas na phung po lnga de ni yod pa yang ma yin/ byed pa yang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen kyis bskyed pa yang ma yin/ chu dang rkyer myed pas bskyed pa yang ma yin pa/ tshig kyis 'og tu myi 'phebs pa/ mying dang /
109b2(mdo): mtshan ma myed pa/ rgyu dang rkyen myed pa/ dpes bstan du myed pa/ thog ma dang tha mar dben pa/ rang gi rang gi stong pa ste/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyis mkhyend par bya ba yin gyi// gzhan gi spyod yul tu
109b3(mdo): ma gyu rad pa'o// de bas na phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ston to// gzhan yang rigs kyi lha mo gang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don dam pa dang /
109b4(mdo): kun rdzob gzhan dang / gzhan ma yin par 'dod pa de ni dpag par dka' ba ste// 'phags pa dang / ma rabs kyi spyod yul ni gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te/ kun rdzob kyang ma spangs
109b5(mdo): don dam pa yang bral bar ma gyur pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa'o// de'i// che bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsald pa dang /
109b6(mdo): rigs kyi lha mo de rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcog la gzar/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs nas/ thal mo sbyar ba btud
109b7(mdo): de/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag gis bslab par
109b8(mdo): 'tshal lo// de nas myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dug pas rigs kyi lha mo rin cen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces dris so// lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shi nang tu bsgrub
109b9(mdo): par dka' ba 'di khyod ji ltar spyod pas de la dbang thob par gyur pa// de nas rigs kyi lha mos tshas pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
110a1(mdo): dod de shi nang tu zab pas// so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de'i don myi shes te// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul bas// mchog tu phra ba shes par dka' ba'o// bdag ni chos 'di la brten te/ bde bar gnas
110a2(mdo): pa thob bo// gal te tshig de bden pa lta na/ snyigs ma rnam lnga'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di dag na tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i sems de dag thams cad gser gi kha dog can du gyur te// mtshan sum bcu rtsal
110a3(mdo): gnyis dang ldan pa/ skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud myed kyang ma yin pa sha dag tu gyur da te/ rin po che'i pad ma la 'dug cing / bde ba tshad myed pas longs spyod pa dang / lha'i me tog kyi char 'bab cing / lha'i sil snyan dang /
110a4(mdo): rol mo ma bkrol bar rab 'byung ba'i mchod pa de lta bu dang ldan par sho gshig ces smras ma thag tu snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad no// sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad gser gi kha dog
110a5(mdo): can skyes bu chen po mtshan dang ldan pa skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud mye da kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po che'i pad ma la 'dug cing / bde/ ba tshad myed pas longs spyod par gyur pa ni/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul
110a6(mdo): dbang byed lha'i gzhal myed khang pa dang / ngana'i kro thams cad myed cing rin po che'i ljon shing sna tshogs bres pa/ rin po che sna bduni kyi pad mas 'jig rten gau khams khyab par byas pa/ rin po che sna
110a7(mdo): bdun dang / lha'i me tog ki cher 'bab pa lha'i rol mo sna tshogs kyis longs spyod par gnas pazhim du gyurd to// de nas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro yang bud myed kyi lus las// tshangs pa'i lus su bsgyur
110a8(mdo): cing 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa'i rin cen 'od 'phro la tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa khyod ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod// smras pa tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po chu'i zla ba
110a9(mdo): byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin// bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// rmyi la byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin// bdag kyang byang chub kyi sprad pa spyod do// smyig rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin// bdag
110b1(mdo): byang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// smra brgyan byang chub kyi spyang pa spyod pa bzhin// bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyad do// de ska ces bshad pa/ tshangs pa chen pos thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//
110b2(mdo): btsun pa khyod dam ka pal gnas te/ cig 'di skad ces sba// snga mos smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chos kag kyang bden pa'i mtshan nyid du ma grub cing // rgyu dang rkyen la brten nas grub pa'i phyir ro// tshangs pa'i rgyal
110b3(mdo): pos smras pa gas te lta na/ ma so'i skye ba'i thams cad kyang / bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so// skyes bu khyod ci'i phyir/ de skad ces sma/ khyim pa
110b4(mdo): yang gzhan mkhas pa yang gzhan/ byang chub kyang gzhan/ byang chub ma yin pa yang bzhan/ rnam par grol ba yang gzhan/ rnam par grol ba ma yin pa yang gzhan ma yin mod kyi// tshangs pa chen po
110b5(mdo): chos de dag thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid da/ so so ma yin pa yang dag par dbyer byed pa/ bar 'tsham sa myed pa'i phel ba dang 'grib pa myed pa la mngon par chags
110b6(mdo): 'dzind to// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dper na/ sku ma mkham nade'i slob ma sbru ma sprul pa la mkhas shing byang bar gyurd pa zhig/ kis/ lam kyi bzhi mdor/ sa dang bye ma dang / shing dang rtswa dang /
110b7(mdo): lo ma las stsogs pa gnas gcig tu bsdus te/ sgyu ma sprul pa 'di lta ste ha dang rga me na gang gi tas co dzo dag / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang / bang ba dang mdzod las stsogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun la ston to//
110b8(mdo): de la sems can byis pa blun pa myi shes pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis mthong na// sgyu ma sprul par myi shes te/ rta dang glang po che las stsogs pa mthong ba dang / zos pa 'di dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin te/
110b9(mdo): gzhan ni brdzun pa snyam du sems shing / phyis kyang de bzhin du rtogs par myi byed do// de la mkhas pa shes pa'i rang bzhin can rnams ni/ de lta ma yin te/ sgyu ma sprul pa yin pa shes nas/ zos pa dang
111a1(mdo): mthong ba de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ rta dang glang po che las stsogs pa bdag gis mthong ba 'di dag yang dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma sprul pas 'gro ba'i myig slu bar byed pa ste/ rta dang glang po che dang / bang
111a2(mdo): mdzod las stsogs pa 'di dag ni der snang ba tsam du zad de// bdag gis mthong pa dang thos pa bzhin du bden pa ma yin par yang 'dzin la/ byas zhib du brtags na yang brdzun pa slu ba'i chos su shes so// de lta
111a3(mdo): bas na nam mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs te/ ji ltar mthong ba dang / zos pa yang kun rdzob tsam du de dag don mtshon pa yang tshig gi tha snyad la rten
111a4(mdo): nas/ yang dag pa'i don shes par bya ba tsam du zad kyi don dam pa ni de lta ma yin no snyam mo// yang tshangs pa chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi myig ma
111a5(mdo): thob pa rnams kyis ni chos 'di dag thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid pa// rjod du myed par yang myi shes la/ gang mthong ba dang thos pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams ji ltar brtags
111a6(mdo): pa bltar bden pa nyid du mngon par zhes te// chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du myed pa'i don dam pa'i tshul de shes par myi nus so// de 'phags pa rnams kyis ni gang gzigs shing gsan pa dang /
111a7(mdo): 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyi mthu dang / las ji lta bu yin pa de la bden pa'o zhes mngon par myi zhe nad te/ 'du byed kyi chos kyang myi bden pa// 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang myi bden pa
111a8(mdo): yang dag pa ma yin pas rtog pa rtags pa tsam du/ 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang phyi tsam du zad pa/ bden pa'i rang bzhin du ma grub par 'phags pa rnams kyis/ kun rdzob kyi tha snyad
111a9(mdo): la brten nas/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i don de bstond par byed do// de bzhin du tshangs pa chen po gang 'phags pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i gzigs pas chos rnams kyi de banin
111b1(mdo): nyid brjod du myed pa bzhin/ 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang de bzhin du blta ste/ kun rdzob du mying dang mtshan ma sna tshogs la brtenang nas/ gzhan la stonang par byed do// de nas yang byang chub sem
111b2(mdo): dpa' rin cen de phrol tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so// sems can ji snyed gcig gis chos zab po 'di lta bu rtogs shing shes par nus smras pa// tshangs pa chen po gang sprul pa mang po'i sa
111b3(mdo): dang sems las byung bas chos zab mo 'di yang dag par shes gyurd pa de snyed kyis so// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ spru da pa de dag nyid kyang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na// de dag gi sems dang / ses
111b4(mdo): las byung ba gang nas skye bar 'gyur smras pa/ gang chos kyi dbyings yod pa yang ma yin/ myed pa yang ma yin par yang dag par shes pa de dag gis/ zab mo de'i don shes par nus so// de nas tshangs pa chen
111b5(mdo): bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btso/ ma ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rin cen 'od 'phro 'di ni ba sam gyis myi khyab ste/ chos kyi gzungs zab mo 'di la mkhas
111b6(mdo): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/ tshangs pa chen po de ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa zhin no// byang chub sems dpa' rin cen 'od 'phro 'dis khyed la
111b7(mdo): ji skad bstand pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrub shig dang / myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po tshang pa chen po dang / gzhan yang tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag stan las langs te/ bla gos
111b8(mdo): phrag pa gcig tu gzar/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lbu ngas la btsugs nas/ thal mo sbyard pas byang chub sems dpa' rin cen 'od 'phro'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so//
111b9(mdo): de skyes bu chen po khyod dang phrad cing / bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thos par gyur da pa/ ngo mtshar che lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la bka' stsald pa// bya chub sems dang
112a1(mdo): chen po rin cen 'od 'phro 'di me 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rin chen 'od 'phro dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
112a2(mdo): pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ bla na myed pa skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang myi rnams kyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de skad ces
112a3(mdo): bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum stong kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyurd to// lha'i bu khri phrag brgya stong dang / rgyal po dang blon las stsogs
112a4(mdo): pa tshad myed grangs myed pa rnams kyis/ rtul myed cing rdul dang bral ba'i chos la chos kyi myig rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na dge slong khri phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems
112a5(mdo): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ byang chub kyi sems las phyir myi ldog par sems pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rin ce na/ 'od 'phros chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ byang chub kyi sems byin
112a6(mdo): zhing brtan pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa bla na myed pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas/ yang byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ so so nas rang rab kyi kos gyon pa phur te/ byang chub sems dang/
112a7(mdo): la gsol nas/ bla na myed pa'i mchog dam pa sems bskyed de/ smon lam 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji mchis pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
112a8(mdo): byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o zhes smon lam btab bo// tshangs pa chen po dge slong de dag gis/ bsod nams de la brten nas ji skad smras pa bzhin nan tan du bsgrubs nas/ bskald pa chen po dgu bcu 'das
112a9(mdo): pa na/ 'khor ba las yongs su 'das pa'i shes pa skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dge dag khyed skal pa grangs myed pa sum bcu 'das pa'i
112b1(mdo): 'og tu/ bla na myed pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ skal pa'i mying ni rgyal bar dka' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya/ yul gyi mying ni dri ma myed pa'i 'od ces bya bar tus gcig tu kun kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
112b2(mdo): 'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag kun kyang mtshan smon lam rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i yon tan gyi mtshan bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes lung bstan to// gzhan yang
112b3(mdo): tshangs pa chen po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po gang nyand pa dang / 'dzind pa de dag mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na gang la la zhig gis zabs dang myi ldan pas pa
112b4(mdo): rol tu phyind pa drug skal pa chen po brgyad stong du spyod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di glegs bam tu bris te/
112b5(mdo): zla ba byed phyed cing sems rtse gcig tu byas te// klog cing 'a// don na bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po sA/ ma des brgya'i char yang myi phod pa nas grangs su bgrang ba dang
112b6(mdo): dper bskrun par yang myi bzod do// tshangs pa chen po de lta bas na/ khyed kyis rtag tu yi la bya zhing / nan tan du bsgrub pa dang / gzung zhing gzhan la yang dag par rgya cher bstand par
112b7(mdo): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga byang chub sems dpo'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar skyes bu dpa'o g.yul ror lus dang srog la myi lta bzhin du/ ngas kyang mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gzung
112b8(mdo): zhing 'dzind pa dang / klog cing 'don pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par stond pa la logs pa myed par gyur to// tshangs pa chen po dper na/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po nam/ 'jig rten na
112b9(mdo): gnas kyi bar du rin po che sna bdun yang myed par myi 'gyur ro// gal te rgyal po yang myi bzhugs na/ rin po che sna bdun yang mod la myed par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa chen po de ltar de bzhin du/ gser
113a1(mdo): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar bya/ bla na myed pa'i chos rin po che thams cad kyang nub par myi 'gyur ro// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di nam myed pa dang / gzhan dag kyang /
113a2(mdo): nub par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems rtse gcig tu byas te/ mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bshad pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / lus
113a3(mdo): dang srog la myi lta bas ngal ba dang / dub pa khyad par du gsod cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bya ste/ bsod nams kyi nang na mchog yin par nga'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du slab cing nan
113a4(mdo): tan du bya'o// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po las stsogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor grangs myed pa dang / rgya byin lnga'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po
113a5(mdo): las stsogs pa de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ bla go/ sa phrag pa gcig tu gzar/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la ba tsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
113a6(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po srung ba dang / yongs su rgyas par 'gyi'o// chos 'di ston pa'i dgegs dang /
113a7(mdo): bar chad gsald te/ dge bar 'gyur ba dang / kha dog dang mthu yongs su rdzogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa myed dang / lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'khor rnams kyang bde ba nyams su myong/
113a8(mdo): ba dang kar gnas pa'i yul 'khor de yang mu ke dang dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / khyim bde ba 'tshe ban ga kri ma dpang bad na pa'i ma sa sa su thus da de na su pa dag / gdod pa ni sa 'azung bar byad ded/ byang ga ga da'i du 'gas par 'a kyis/ ma ban
113a9(mdo): cipo rim 'gro bgyid na/ de la bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mchod cing rim 'gro bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyise lnga'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po las stsogs te/ tshangs
113b1(mdo): pa'i 'khor de dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gi dbang po las stsogs pa rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal da te/ legs so legs so rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dam pa'i chos zab mo 'di yang thos/ mdo sde'i
113b2(mdo): dbang po 'di dang / de 'dzind pa la srung ba dang skyab pa'i sems bskyed pa des bsod nams kyi khyad par tshad myed pa dang ldan pas/ myu rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
113b3(mdo): rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po las stsogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde
113b4(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal po las stong pa nyid la rten nas bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul
113b5(mdo): 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po myog myi bzang stan las langs te/ bla kos phrag pa kA/ cig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs/
113b6(mdo): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun ba bcom ldan ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
113b7(mdo): rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
113b8(mdo): thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ nang ci pa ca cad kyis rgyag bgyis gnang ca mas kyi cho palha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par stod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod
113b9(mdo): nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba thams cad la mchog tu bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba/
114a1(mdo): dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi sdug bsngal thams cad skyems pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa/
114a2(mdo): mu ke'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams cad seld pa/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid
114a3(mdo): pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa 'bum rab tu 'jom par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi
114a4(mdo): nang tu rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa/ chos mnyan na/ chos bdud pa'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di gzi byin chen pos rnam
114a5(mdo): par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag ki lus la brtson ba dang / stobs dang mthu yang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang bdag cag gi lus
114a6(mdo): la 'jug par 'gyur te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po gas te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha
114a7(mdo): dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / sna ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs myi bzad pa/ snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan
114a8(mdo): kyi gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ gnod sbyin kyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig/
114a9(mdo): tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i myig rnam par dag pa kyi'i las 'das pa/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad la lta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag
114b1(mdo): cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ 'jig rten skyong zhes mying du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kang su dag 'dzam bu 'agling 'dir/ pha rol kyi dpag tshogs kyis yul 'jom par 'gyur ram/ mu ke'i yang ba
114b2(mdo): 'am/ nad kyi yang ba 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa 'bum dag gis gtses par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa dag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ gser
114b3(mdo): 'od dam pa yado sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// sun bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang / byin
114b4(mdo): kyi rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag bskul pa na/ yul kang dang kang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par bston par 'gyur te/ gang
114b5(mdo): gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa steng yul du 'byung ba/ 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'o
114b6(mdo): dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gse ra 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyu ra ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam myi'i rgyal pos gser
114b7(mdo): 'od dam mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te/ zos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad la kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'dzind pa dang /
114b8(mdo): yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ myi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bkyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang /
114b9(mdo): yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge'
115a1(mdo): bsnyen ma dang / mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa la/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis/ bde bar bgyid pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bka/ rgyal po chen po bzhis/ myi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad
115a2(mdo): na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam myi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/
115a3(mdo): dge snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzind pa la/ sti steng bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ myi'i rgyal po chen
115a4(mdo): po de la/ rgyal po thams cad pas/ ches sti stang du bgyi/ ches bla mar bkyi/ ches rim gror bkyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o//
115a5(mdo): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po che/ na po bzhis/ lha dang myi la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ste le'u pa/ cu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
115a6(mdo): 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la/ legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs so legs so// 'di lte ste khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la/
115a7(mdo): lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos sma co chos kyis lha dang myi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o//
115a8(mdo): 'di lta ste/ khyed ni yun ring por mas can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
115a9(mdo): zhugs pa/ myi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrubs par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis/ myi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
115b1(mdo): po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang rim gror byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shi ka// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis
115b2(mdo): shig/ des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kum tu
115b3(mdo): bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyangs pa dang / yongs su bzung b.ra'ang 'gyur ro// des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang ka yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang myi dang snu sa
115b4(mdo): yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin nas 'pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol kyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir
115b5(mdo): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba kyis shi/ ka/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang /
115b6(mdo): yongs su bskrad ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyi sa shi ka// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam zos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes
115b7(mdo): po dang / rgyal po chen po myag myi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
115b8(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'od grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs
115b9(mdo): sam yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / myi'i rgyal po gang dang kang dang kar gyi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal por gyur pa gapal la zhog/
116a1(mdo): lnga'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ram/ dge slong
116a2(mdo): ma 'am/ dge snyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gro bgyid cing mchod de rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
116a3(mdo): nyan na / chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chus/ bdud rtsi'i zhu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin chen po rnam par
116a4(mdo): 'phel bar 'gyur// bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur// bdag cag ki kazi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel
116a5(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po/ chen po bzhi dpung dpag yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lus bltar myi gda' bar bkyis te/ da ltar dang ma
116a6(mdo): 'ongs pa'i dus na/ krong dam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di sprod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi'
116a7(mdo): bar bgyi'o// myi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dka la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs
116a8(mdo): su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang/ yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung
116a9(mdo): bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang /
116b1(mdo): gnod pa dang 'khrug pa thams cad las yongasu za rad par bgyi'o// pha rol kyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar zlog par bgyi'o// myi'i rgyal po ka pa la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan
116b2(mdo): pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla mdapa nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla mdab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du/ bdag dpung gi tshogs
116b3(mdo): yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go ga du mes skyed na/ tsun pa bco ldan 'das de'i tshe de dus dgaser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i kazi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla mad pa nye ba'i rgyal
116b4(mdo): po de/ rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur// nga rang kyi yul du phyi nad na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa myi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul tu gza' dang /
116b5(mdo): nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gyi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sna
116b6(mdo): tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla mdab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bstsags te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su ma
116b7(mdo): ba'i slad cu rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam
116b8(mdo): par gzhig 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / lhan cig tu lus myi gda' bar bgyis te/ der
116b9(mdo): mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol kyi dpag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel pa sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta/
117a1(mdo): ste yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchir yang myi nus la/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ka la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs o zhes bya ba byin te/
117a2(mdo): rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs so// khyed bskal pa grangs myed pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
117a3(mdo): byang chub 'di'i phyir/ myi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
117a4(mdo): bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyar ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs u 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul
117a5(mdo): de dag kun tu bsrungs shika// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yo ngas su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde lags su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de
117a6(mdo): dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par gyis shig/ pha rol kyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog par gyis shig/ 'dzam bu klong thams cad na
117a7(mdo): gnas pa'i myi'o rgyal po dag myi 'thab pa dang / 'tshang myi 'dru ba dang / myi rtsod pa dang / myi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gse shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i 'dzam bu gling 'dir
117a8(mdo): nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag dang / rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dka' ba dang / rang gyi nor gyi phung pos phan
117a9(mdo): tshun rnam par myi 'tshe ba dang/ phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba myi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon ka las bstsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig
117b1(mdo): par myi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir/ pha rol myi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu gling 'dir/ grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur// byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i
117b2(mdo): sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du myi 'thab/ 'tshang myi 'dru/ myi rtsod myi 'gyed pa rab rang gyi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i 'dzam bu'i gla de 'di rgyas
117b3(mdo): par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang myi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang byin can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo 'khyud khor thams cad kyang yang dag
117b4(mdo): pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu gling thams
117b5(mdo): cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams / da 'byor da par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang ser sna myed par 'a// gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi
117b6(mdo): lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la
117b7(mdo): zhig myi'i rgyal por 'gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nyan par gyur da te/ rim gro dang / mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dang
117b8(mdo): po 'dzind pa de dag la yang sti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir rtag pa'i
117b9(mdo): rgyun tu gisar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu rlung / chu'i bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi
118a1(mdo): byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs kyang bskyed do// khyed kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
118a2(mdo): myi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro// myi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang /
118a3(mdo): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la yang / yo byad bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// des na myi'i rgyal
118a4(mdo): po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na myi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs
118a5(mdo): su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu/ rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro//
118a6(mdo): yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bsku nga ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bya sa par 'gyur// rgyal po pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams
118a7(mdo): cad kyang ches gzi byo dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur// dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de
118a8(mdo): dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur// yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur/ gnod pa myed par 'gyur/ dgra myed par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis myi rdzi ba dang / gnod pa myed pa dang / 'khrug
118a9(mdo): pa myed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen
118b1(mdo): po byig myi bzang dang / de dag 'di skad ces gsol to// btsu pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal po kapal la zhig gser 'od dpapa mdo sde'i dbang po ma ma pa nyan 'tshal bar gyur// bdag nyid la yang bzlar
118b2(mdo): ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur da/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la 'ang / bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur da// rgyal po'i
118b3(mdo): pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la 'ang zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur pa chen po bsam gyis myi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa/ bla na myed pa bgyi 'tshal bar gyur da/ tshe 'di la bdag gi rgyal srid
118b4(mdo): kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam kyis myi khyab kyis mya khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur da// rgyal po nyid bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag
118b5(mdo): tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzan 'tshal bar gyur da// bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsru ba 'tshal bar gyur da// yod/ sa su skyong 'tshal bar gyur da// rang kaM yul na gnod pa ma
118b6(mdo): mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol kyi dpag tshogs kyis myi rdzi ba dang / nad 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur da na// btsun pa bcom
118b7(mdo): ldan 'das kyi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ sti steng dru bkyis te mnyan par bgyi'o//
118b8(mdo): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ byi'i rgyal po des/ rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang / rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis/
118b9(mdo): chag cag btab cing / me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs chag chag btab pa der/ chos kyi mkhri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs
119a1(mdo): der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// myi'i rgyal po des lus dkru bar bgyi'o// kos dri rab tu gda' ba/ gos sar pa mdzes pa/ bgos nas
119a2(mdo): dza rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gting bar bgyi ste/ stan de la mchis nas/ rgyal po'i rgyas pas dregs par myi bgyi'o// deng rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par gyi
119a3(mdo): bgyi'o// rgyags pa dbang rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par
119a4(mdo): 'du shes skyed par bgyi'o// myi'i rgyal po des/ de'i tshe de'i sa na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la/ sdug/
119a5(mdo): pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan pa sma/ bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'o'akhor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang /
119a6(mdo): tshig snyan pa smra bar bkyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar du gsal bar bgyi'o// dka' ba bsam kyis myi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas/ bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga'
119a7(mdo): ba dang bde ba bsam gyis myi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po
119a8(mdo): bskyed nas/ chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ myi'i rgyal po des kos
119a9(mdo): thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o// sdud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bya'o// rgyal po'i bu chen po mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i
119b1(mdo): bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang der byung la/ chos smra ba bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor ba/ de ji snyed kyi bskal
119b2(mdo): ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum kyi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal ri gas bye ba phrag khrig phrag 'bum 'thob par 'gyur// der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du/ tshe 'od la rgyal srid
119b3(mdo): kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha'i gzhal myed khang rin po che sna bdun las/ byas pa dag thob par 'gyur//
119b4(mdo): myi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lnga'i rgya che zhing rgyame ba 'bum phrag tu ma thob par 'gyur// skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du mchol par 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan
119b5(mdo): bar 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa/ dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shi nad tu rgya che bar 'gyur// bsngag/ sa par 'ol par 'gyur/ lha dang myi dang lha ma ya ni dang bcas pa'i
119b6(mdo): 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mya rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba 'thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/
119b7(mdo): mdzes pa dang / lha na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes kanyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nas
119b8(mdo): kyi phung po dpag tu myed pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas/ mye'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ga bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang /
119b9(mdo): dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa deng bdag
120a1(mdo): gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'dug par 'gyur ro// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa/ bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyu ro//
120a2(mdo): deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o// deng bdag chos mnyan pa 'dis/ bla na myed pa
120a3(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang /
120a4(mdo): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ mchod pa chen po bsam gyis myi khyab pa langs na nga rgya che byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba
120a5(mdo): dang / hud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig brten gi/ sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig
120a6(mdo): 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byiT+Ti kye lus bye ba phrag khrig 'bru ma phrag du ma 'thob pa bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur
120a7(mdo): ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los brgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtse ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar
120a8(mdo): 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu myed pa bla na myed pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su 'azung bar 'gyur ro// de bdag gi
120a9(mdo): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i lo brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba/ bsam gyis kyi byeng ba/ mchog tu khyad par dul dra
120b1(mdo): pa bla na myed pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis yul 'ad pas cad kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa myed pa dang / dgra myed pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis myi
120b2(mdo): rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba myed pa dang / 'khrug pa myed par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
120b3(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzind pa dag lo myi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus sti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod pa byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha
120b4(mdo): 'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ myi'i rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi
120b5(mdo): rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam kyis myi khyab pa des/ rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi badz+ra da chen po bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
120b6(mdo): dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang brgya na par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang dgra thams cad chos dang mthun pas shi nad tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka'
120b7(mdo): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kang la la zhig/ myi'i rgyal por gyur da la de chos la gus pa de lta bus/ gser 'od
120b8(mdo): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag la yang / sti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim kro bgyid
120b9(mdo): cing / rgyal po chen po bdag gi slad du/ rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang ldan cig mthun mong du
121a1(mdo): chos mnyan pa de nyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad cig sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de/ chos kyi stan la mchis ma zag
121a2(mdo): du/ phyi'i rgyal po des/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis gdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i sa
121a3(mdo): du/ gdug pas gdugs ma thag ru/ spos sna tshogs rnams las/ spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig zang cig/ yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang
121a4(mdo): rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang kaduka pa sA tshogs kyi khri shing dag gyi gdugs rnams yongs su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri phye chen po yang mnam par 'gyur// gser gi kha dog lta
121a5(mdo): bu'i snang ba 'byung zhing / snang ba des/ bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyes par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom lnga na 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag/ skad cig
121a6(mdo): zang cig yud tsam de la myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / !rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen po dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen po brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin ka sde dpon chen po yang dag
121a7(mdo): shes dang / gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dben chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma bu
121a8(mdo): lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma 'dres pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag gi rang rang gi khang pa steng gi khar snang la byung ste/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis khri shing gi gdug
121a9(mdo): nams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs kyu chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// rdzo
121b1(mdo): skad ces gsosad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag dang / rgyal po chen po phyed bzhi'i rang kyi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snangs spos dang 'dug/
121b2(mdo): ba sna tshogs kyi khri shing de dag/ gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i byor zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag/ myi'i rgyal po des// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos snga
121b3(mdo): tshogs de dag gis gdugs la bka du/ lag pa pog sdod gcig thogs pa de las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khro shong rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te// de skad cig zang cig/ yud tsam de la/ stong gsum
121b4(mdo): ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na/ ka na zla ba bye ba brag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang // rgya mtsho na po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri ba bye phrag brgya dang / rim
121b5(mdo): rgyal khor yu ka dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha bye ba phraka brgya dang / sum bcu
121b6(mdo): gsum bya ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes myed/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad
121b7(mdo): d+hu/ sum bcu ma gsum ki lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dI na dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs nas
121b8(mdo): kyi/ rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng kyi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par gyur da/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su kase
121b9(mdo): gi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ lha'i 'ang
122a1(mdo): pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa'i khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin su/ kaser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ myi'i rgyal po/
122a2(mdo): des/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis gdugs ma thag tu/ kaser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig/
122a3(mdo): mang cig yud tsam de la/ kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams du ma/ gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag/
122a4(mdo): tu ma/ gang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing rnams su gnas par 'gyur// de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma ya/ spos dang /
122a5(mdo): bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur// kase/ ra gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// snang ba des kyangasangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ gang ka'i
122a6(mdo): klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dang / cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu/ de bzhin ka sheg sa pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ kang ka'i klung gi bye ma
122a7(mdo): snyed dag na chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lte bu/ zab mo'i don 'di lta bu/ yon tan
122a8(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// su za na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
122a9(mdo): nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ngan ngon dang ldan par myi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par ston
122b1(mdo): pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ bla na myed pa yang dag par/
122b2(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba
122b3(mdo): khrag khrig 'bum phrag tu ma/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhi ban bzhugs pa dag gis/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshig mthun pa dang / ngag mthun pa dang / sgra skad mthun pas dge slong chos smra ba/ chos kyi khri stan la
122b4(mdo): 'dug pa de la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/
122b5(mdo): shid kyi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po/ thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can tham/ sa cad las rab tu 'das pa'i rtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod
122b6(mdo): pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin kyi rlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khragakhrig 'bum phrag tu ma dag ston par 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po la legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur ba dang /
122b7(mdo): skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis myi khyab pa// gzugs/
122b8(mdo): rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ myi sdug pa la ston pa// gzugs myi sdug pa sna tshogs dka las rgyal bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na myed pa
122b9(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe' myed pa rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i bad na/ snying po brtan pa 'dug ste/ chos kyi
123a1(mdo): 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu bab pa tha na myed pa rnas pa brgya gnyis rab tu bsko bar 'gyur// sa kyis dang da sa kyibad can ma pa byed sa
123a2(mdo): skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgrengs par 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi smon ma bla na byed pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi cher bla na myed pa 'bebs par
123a3(mdo): 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ 'jigs pa chen
123a4(mdo): po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dka 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su tha rad par byed par 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas
123a5(mdo): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsald pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgya la po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsold to// btsun pa
123a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / byung ba 'di lta bu 'a de dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas 'bul la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
123a7(mdo): bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzind pa mthong nas/ snying rtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin
123a8(mdo): 'bum phrag shum rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu/ lus myi gda' bar bgyis te/ mye'i rgyal po de'i khang pa rtsegs pa/ phyag dang
123a9(mdo): ma mchis pa/ legs par phyag bgyis pa spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ka la ba der/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du
123b1(mdo): mami bar bgyi'o// myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen po dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen po dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
123b2(mdo): po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin go sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma
123b3(mdo): bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya brtso dang / skra bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du pa dag/ lus kyi gda' bar bgyis te/ mye'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa
123b4(mdo): de ka la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna chegs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur ro//
123b5(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad mthun par bgyis te/ myi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid
123b6(mdo): pa/ dge ba 'thob par bgyid pa/ bla na myed pa chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa de la/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par 'gyur ma thag tu/ myo'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa
123b7(mdo): dang yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// myi'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de yang kun tu bsrung bar bar bgyi'o// yongs
123b8(mdo): su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar bgyi'o// yul de la yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad
123b9(mdo): 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su tha rad par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ka pa la la zhig myi'i rgyal por gyur te/ myi'i rgyal po de'i yul du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
124a1(mdo): rgyal po 'di thungal// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal po de dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge snyen ma ka ser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzind pa dag
124a2(mdo): la/ sti stang myi bgyid/ bla mar myi bgyid/ rim gror myi bgyid/ mchod pa myi bkye de na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tu ma la chos nyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i
124a3(mdo): khu ba 'das tshim par myi bgyid/ rim 'gro mya be pyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin yang rnam par 'phel/ myi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu' dang stobs kyang myi bskyed/ bdag cag gi lus
124a4(mdo): la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar myi bgyid pa lags so// bcom pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod
124a5(mdo): bye ba khrag khri ka 'bum phrag du ma dag kyis yul de yal bar dorabar dgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi yul de yal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lA'i tsho gas thams cad
124a6(mdo): kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/
124a7(mdo): rgyal po'i 'khrug pa myo ba zad pa/ myi bzod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur// yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / 'tshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang 'gyed
124a8(mdo): par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang / phan tshun myi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/
124a9(mdo): dgung zla 'char ba na/ nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang / nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa yang / tag par rgyun tu sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan pa 'gyur// /
124b1(mdo): dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyim par 'gyur/ sa yang g.yol bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin par grag 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char pa drag po 'bab
124b2(mdo): bar 'gyur/ yul du mu ge yang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams myi
124b3(mdo): dka' bar 'gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang kayog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag tu pa dang / yul na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu rnams kyis yul de ya la @
124b4(mdo): bor nas/ yul des 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kra ba la la zhig myi'i rgyal por 'gyur la// de bdag nyid la kun tu
124b5(mdo): bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna/ tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bde ba tham sa cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal
124b6(mdo): bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar da 'tshal bar gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul thams cad tu yun ring+ra du
124b7(mdo): yongs su skyong 'tshal bar 'gyur/ chos kyis rgyal po nyid 'gyod 'tshal bar 'gyur// rang gi yul yang 'jogs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su
124b8(mdo): thar par 'gyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi'i rgyal po des/ gdon myi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyid/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong
124b9(mdo): ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gro bogyi/ mchod pa bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi bung dang
125a1(mdo): g.yog du bcas pa rnams kyang chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi bdag cag gi lnga'i lus 'di dag kau ga'i byin chen po yang / rnam par 'phel
125a2(mdo): bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal po des gdon myi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i
125a3(mdo): dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das po'i bstan chos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin kyis/ bstan chos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstadad pa das dang / drang srong mngon
125a4(mdo): bar shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis/ sems can dag gi don ka slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i stan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog/ ches
125a5(mdo): khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po/ 'i rgyal po 'di ni// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang / po 'bum de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma
125a6(mdo): dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can/ bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'pha gas pa'i de bzhig gshegs pas/ sems can rnams kyi don
125a7(mdo): gyi slad du/ rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lags so// ji nas kyang 'dzam bu gling thams cad na/ gnas pa'i myi rnams kyis rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ji nas sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur
125a8(mdo): ba dang / dzi nas rang gi yul kun bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ji nas yul thams cad ni gnod pa dang / dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / dzi nas pha rol gi dmag tshogs
125a9(mdo): rnams pham ste/ phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / jo nas yul de dag na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing / 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji nas yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing myi rdzi bar
125b1(mdo): gyung ba dang / rinas kyi'i rgyal po de dag gis/ rang rang gi sus rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bams gyis shikri/ snang bar bgyis par 'gyu ba dang / rinas lnga'i khang khyim thams cad lnga dag dang / lha'i bu na
125b2(mdo): kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / dzi nas bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpu dang ka yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag tu ma dang / 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim
125b3(mdo): gro bgyid papa 'char ba dang / ji nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus su 'di dag ga'i byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dzin sa bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po bskyed par
125b4(mdo): 'gyur ba dang / dzi nas bdag gi lus la gzodzod dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs par rab tu 'jug par par 'gyur ba dang / dzin sa 'jam bu gling thams cad lo legs shing nyes dkal la/ skye bo dang kyi
125b5(mdo): mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang / dza nas 'dzam bu gling tham sa cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dka' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji nas sems can
125b6(mdo): thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tu mar lnga dang myi 'i bde ba rgya che zhing / rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang
125b7(mdo): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad da lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rjod
125b8(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag pas/ ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin kyi rlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag gi
125b9(mdo): lha'i shes pa pas/ ches 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyend pa bla na myed pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas/ ches 'phags
126a1(mdo): pa'i byin gi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/
126a2(mdo): dza 'dzam bu gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do// myi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan chos dang / rgyal po'i bkyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems
126a3(mdo): can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyisegaser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
126a4(mdo): 'dir nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu de dang / rkyen des/ myi'i rgyal po des/ ka don myo 'tshal bar/ kaser 'od dam
126a5(mdo): ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gro bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po
126a6(mdo): chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang kayog tu bcas pas gnod myi za ba ra/ myi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
126a7(mdo): po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba cher gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma
126a8(mdo): mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa 'di dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzind du chug shi ka dang / de dag lha dang lha ma yin du bcas po'i 'jig rten 'di la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur// gser
126a9(mdo): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher/ yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te// rgyal po chen po phyed bzhes ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen
126b1(mdo): nam/ dge bsnyen ma bsrungs pa dang / gnod pa myed pa dang / nad myed pa dang / 'khrug pa myed pa dang / sems bde bar 'gyur zhing / gser 'od dam mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dayang dag par rab tu stond par
126b2(mdo): 'gyur bar/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen na ma/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzind pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs
126b3(mdo): su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam zos kyi bu stan las langs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la yid bzhin nor bu zhes
